channel.title: Perfect censoring [Non-Renamed]
channel.description:
[b]Purpose[/b]: [i]Perfect censor for non-renamed clients[/i]
[b]Difficulty[/b]: [i]1[/i]
[b]Assumed Knowledge[/b]: [i]C+P[/i]
[b]Classes Modified[/b]: [i]Class34[/i]
[b]Step 1[/b]: Open up class34 and search for, [code]method497[/code]
[B]Step 2[/B]: At the bottom of method497 find, [code]return s;[/code]
[B]Step 3[/B]: replace that with, [code]return (new String(ac)).trim();[/code]
[b]Credits[/b]: [i]100% Gnarly[/i]
[B]If you want to un-censor words in class34 find,[/B] [code]aStringArray626[][/code] And you will see other words in there, just add the word you want un-censored in that array! And BOO-YAA!

item.title: Perfect censoring [Non-Renamed]
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

yes but don’t you people understand that its simply not practical to incease an array every time you want to remove a censored word?

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect censoring [Non-Renamed]
item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

Because they really know how to do that SilabSoft.
This is a way where people without a brain understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect censoring [Non-Renamed]
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

this is a god awful way of doing it, for fuck sake the client has a censor exceptions array in the censor class to begin with(if you choose to be so lazy) but why not simply add or remove the words you want or dont want via cache these are the files you will need to edit depending on what you are doing.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Perfect censoring [Non-Renamed]

item.description:
@Gnarly3 wrote:

Purpose: Perfect censor for non-renamed clients

Difficulty: 1

Assumed Knowledge: C+P

Classes Modified: Class34

Step 1: Open up class34 and search for,

method497

Step 2: At the bottom of method497 find,

return s;

Step 3: replace that with,

return (new String(ac)).trim();

Credits: 100% Gnarly

If you want to un-censor words in class34 find,

aStringArray626[]

And you will see other words in there, just add the word you want un-censored in that array!
And BOO-YAA!
